descriptionText: Hello pet owners! We are hosting a pet meetup on April 7th (THIS FRIDAY) at DogsRUs. Bring your paw friends, and let's have a blast!
Someone help please!!! My dog got into my pantry and had some chocolate. He only had a small lick before I took it away - what should I do???
I made this just to have a random chat with some strangers. Hi!
